text: Tickets for her last ‘ All I Have ’ performances at Planet Hollywood will go on sale Dec. 15. On Aug. 13, 2016, Jennifer Lopez's ` ` All I Have'' residency at Planet Hollywood in Las Vegas hit a milestone, having notched over $ 1 million in ticket sales. It was the highest gross in Planet Hollywood history. The legendary entertainer today announced the final shows of her record - setting residency at The AXIS at Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino, which will take place from June 13 through Sept. 29, 2018. “ Performing ‘ All I Have ’ in Vegas over the last few years has been an incredible and rewarding experience that I won ’ t soon forget. Some of the best memories on stage from my career will forever be equated with this city. Thank you to all
